Wednesday, July 19, 2006

European RailsConf Talk Proposal Deadline Approaching

Posted by chad

For the procrastinators out there, don’t forget that the talk proposal deadline for the European RailsConf is coming this Friday, July 21.

If you missed RailsConf, this is your chance to not only attend but to speak at the first ever European Rails Conference.
